_header: Now is Yule comen with gentle cheer
_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab, same rhymes throughout) and burden: ‘Hay ay hay ay / Make we mere as we may’

BLAdd14997.First Lines:
Now ys ȝole comyn wiþ gentyll chereOf merthe & gomyn
                    he has no pere…
BLAdd14997.Last Lines:
…Let euery mon dyrynke to hys fereThys endes my caroll
                    wiþ care away
BLAdd14997.Attributed Title:
In die dominica prima post festum sancti Michaelis arangeli anno regis
                        henrici septimi post conquestum anglie sextodecimo illa res erat scripta
                        primo (f. 45, in a different hand)
